unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Hypotheses for Means: Waiting Time
question_text: A valet company claims that a customer's  average wait time for their car is $8\text{ minutes}$ .   After waiting $20\text{ minutes}$ to get your car, Bobby believes the valet company's time to get a car is greater than $8\text{ minutes}$ . Which of the following hypotheses would be used to test your belief?

choices.text: H 0 : ¯ ¯ ¯ x = 8 minutes H 0 : x ¯ = 8 minutes H a : ¯ ¯ ¯ x ≠ 8 minutes H a : x ¯ ≠ 8 minutes
H 0 : ¯ ¯ ¯ x = 8 minutes H 0 : x ¯ = 8 minutes H a : ¯ ¯ ¯ x < 8 minutes H a : x ¯ < 8 minutes
H 0 : ¯ ¯ ¯ x = 8 minutes H 0 : x ¯ = 8 minutes H a : ¯ ¯ ¯ x > 8 minutes H a : x ¯ > 8 minutes
H 0 : μ = 8 minutes H 0 : μ = 8 minutes H a : μ < 8 minutes H a : μ < 8 minutes
H 0 : μ = 8 minutes H 0 : μ = 8 minutes H a : μ > 8 minutes H a : μ > 8 minutes
